long_description: The Osprey Jet daypack for kids incorporates legendary Osprey technical design and quality into an everyday pack that bridges the gap between hauling school books and after-school play. Osprey Airscape(TM) ridge-molded foam back panel provides excellent ventilation and comfort. Sewn-in, foam-padded harness features an adjustable sternum strap with rescue whistle buckle. Sewn-in mesh hipbelt with modified ErgoPull(TM) closure provides a secure fit. Dual-zippered, panel-loading main compartment features an organization pocket inside the front panel. Stretch-woven front pocket offers easy access and external storage. Dual stretch-woven side pockets hold water bottles and other often-used items. Top zippered slash pocket provides additional storage and organization.
short_description: The Osprey Jet daypack for kids incorporates legendary Osprey technical design and quality into an everyday pack that bridges the gap between hauling school books and after-school play.
